description: Sets the Data Catalog resource policy for access control.

parameters.name: PolicyInJson
parameters.description: Contains the policy document to set, in JSON format.

parameters.name: EnableHybrid
parameters.description: If 'TRUE', indicates that you are using both methods to grant cross-account access to Data Catalog resources: By directly updating the resource policy with PutResourePolicy By using the Grant permissions command on the Amazon Web Services Management Console. Must be set to 'TRUE' if you have already used the Management Console to grant cross-account access, otherwise the call fails. Default is --FALSE'.

nested_items.name: PolicyHash
nested_items.description: A hash of the policy that has just been set. This must be included in a subsequent call that overwrites or updates this policy.
